name: Staking
description: Staking. Staking contract for stake token for one year. Contract for staking tokens and get 25% interest on staking.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when tokens are recovered by owner.

eventDecorators.name: Staked
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when tokens are recovered by owner.

eventDecorators.name: Unstake
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when tokens are recovered by owner.

eventDecorators.name: Withdrawn
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when tokens are recovered by owner.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: stake
functionDecorators.description: Function used to stake tokens. Purpose of this function is to stake tokens and stake for one year.

parameterDecorators.name: tokens
parameterDecorators.description: a parameter for send number of tokens to stake.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: unstake
functionDecorators.description: Function used to withdraw all his staked coins. Function used to withdraw all his staked coins.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Function used to withdraw interest on his staked coins on monthly basis. Function used to withdraw interest on his staked coins on monthly basis.
